DataListSpec.Name: Declined EFT Tab Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Displays data from EFT Declined process.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_EFTDECLINEBATCH_SPONSORSDATA(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
-- batchtype 0 directdebit, 1 creditcard SELECT USR_EFTDECLINE_BATCH_SPONSORS.ID, CARDHOLDERNAME, SPONSORLOOKUPID, SPONSORNAME, BATCHDATE, DECLINEREASON, case when BATCHTYPE = 'Credit Card' then (coalesce(CARDNUMBER, '') + ':' + coalesce(CARDEXPIRATION,'')) else ACCOUNTINFO end as 'CARD_OR_ACCOUNT', USR_EFTDECLINE_BATCH_SPONSORS.BATCHNUMBER, CHILDINFO, REVENUELOOKUPID, r.ID as RevenueID FROM dbo.USR_EFTDECLINE_BATCH_SPONSORS join dbo.REVENUE r on r.LOOKUPID = REVENUELOOKUPID where r.ID = @CONTEXTID -- RevenueID is the key to associating with the Recurring Gift
